# dokploy_gitea_provider (Resource)

Manages a Gitea provider integration in Dokploy.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `gitea_url` (String) The Gitea instance URL (e.g., https://gitea.example.com).
- `name` (String) The name of the Gitea provider.

### Optional

- `access_token` (String, Sensitive) The OAuth access token.
- `client_id` (String) The Gitea OAuth client ID.
- `client_secret` (String, Sensitive) The Gitea OAuth client secret.
- `expires_at` (Number) Token expiration timestamp.
- `gitea_username` (String) The Gitea username.
- `last_authenticated_at` (Number) Last authentication timestamp.
- `organization_name` (String) The Gitea organization name.
- `redirect_uri` (String) The OAuth redirect URI.
- `refresh_token` (String, Sensitive) The OAuth refresh token.
- `scopes` (String) OAuth scopes.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp.
- `git_provider_id` (String) The git provider ID used for deletion.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the Gitea provider (giteaId).
- `organization_id` (String) The Dokploy organization ID.
